dataList.name: Tipsy
dataList.desc: Lose Clash Power by the effect's Count (Max 5)
dataList.summary: Lose Clash Power by the effect's Count

dataList.name: Hemorrhaging Dimension
dataList.desc: Damage Up +10%

dataList.name: Poisonous Dimension
dataList.desc: Max HP +20%

dataList.name: Tremoring Dimension
dataList.desc: Boost Speed by 1

dataList.name: Electrifying Dimension
dataList.desc: Coin Power +1

dataList.name: Charmed
dataList.desc:
- Speed fixed to 1.
- All damage dealt to Fairy reduced to 0.
- Expires when Fairy dies.
dataList.summary:
Speed fixed to 1
Damage fixed to 0

dataList.name: Regenerate
dataList.desc: Gain 1 every time a part is restored

dataList.name: Protection Umbrella
dataList.desc:
All parts gain Protection equal to the value
When using Waiting Skill, Summon Old Umbrella equal to the value
1 Spent every time an Umbrella is broken.

dataList.name: Interlocking Time
dataList.desc: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.
dataList.summary: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.

dataList.name: Borrowed Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Offense Level Up; If only 1 Count remains, gain 3 Bind 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn
dataList.summary: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Offense Level Up; If only 1 Count remains, gain 3 Bind 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Reattached Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
At 9+ Count, gain 5 Bind at turn end.
At 12+ Count, gain 5 Attack Power Down at turn end. (Max 12)
dataList.summary:
At 9+ Count, gain 5 Bind at turn end.
At 12+ Count, gain 5 Attack Power Down at turn end.

dataList.name: Entangled Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
Deal +1% damage per Count
At 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start (Max 9)
dataList.summary: Deal +1% damage per Count; at 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start

dataList.name: Accumulated Past
dataList.desc:
This displays the Total Turns taken in the Refraction Railway.
The number goes up by 1 at the end of the turn.
Spent completely when body is broken.

dataList.name: Crown of Thorns
dataList.desc: Generates a Rose unit whose Affinity corresponds to the most-owned Skill Affinity of the target inflicted with this effect

dataList.name: Blooming Sin
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn
- Gain 1 Count.
- Bound Identity loses HP equal to 25% of Max HP.
- Lose 10% of E.G.O resource corresponding to the Rose's.
- The Sign of Roses heals HP equal to 5% of its Max HP.

At 4 Count,
- Bound Identity dies.
- Lose all of E.G.O resource corresponding to the Rose's.

dataList.name: Drenched Sin
dataList.desc:
Max HP increases by (E.G.O resource drained)%

On Death
- Recover E.G.O resource it drained.
- Heal bound Identity's HP by (25% of Identity's Max HP * Blooming Sin Count).

dataList.name: Power-up State
dataList.desc: Power-up State passive activated
